column5: When is the walleye opener next year? Already making plans to hit up Red Lake.
Wine Lake Camp for me. 216 days

thought i recognized ur boat up here in red lake this spring was gonna come say hi but didnt know if i should or not i drive a 201 predator team lund boat 60 % wrap on it i passed ya at post narrows a couple times n in east bay maybe next yr u come up ill stop in n say hi if thats ok t c
No problem stop by and say hi. It's always nice to meet new people. I should be up there for the opener next year.
Marc63280 Opener is May 19th. LOTW Sabaskong Bay for my group. Already counting the days! Marv
I'm too slow as well. HeHooksHimself responded earlier with May 19.So I deleted my post with the info...I missed HHH's posting of the date upon first read of the thread.
But at my age, not only is repeating information to me part of my life, it is necessary for me to show up at almost anything!
Marc...Maybe I can go twice in a month?
